variants.text: A curtain of a dim gloom covers a tangled undergrowth. The {{light_level_detail}} reveals {{vague_shape_adj}}.
A curtain of a dim gloom covers a tangled undergrowth. The {{light_level_detail}} reveals {{vague_shape_adj}}.
{{continuation_fragment}} a tangled undergrowth lies ahead, The {{light_level_detail}} reveals {{vague_shape_adj}}.

patterns.template: You weave through {{jungle_terrain_desc_lush}}. The air is {{temp_detail}} and {{moisture_detail}}, carrying {{smell_detail_lush}}.

variants.text: You weave through canopies of vibrant leaves. The air is in the pleasant weather and in the fresh air, carrying the scent of wildflowers.
You weave through canopies of vibrant leaves. The air is in the pleasant weather and in the fresh air, carrying the scent of wildflowers.

{{continuation_fragment}} canopies of vibrant leaves brushes past you; the scent of wildflowers
